entry.summary: Here is a second test post. I am using this post to tets the length of teh summary as well as to see how multiple posts are displayed on the main page. I hope that I will only need to generate two test posts before I am finally ready to â€¦
entry.content: Here is a second test post. I am using this post to tets the length of teh summary as well as to see how multiple posts are displayed on the main page. I hope that I will only need to generate two test posts before I am finally ready to put my site into production.

entry.title: Introduction
entry.summary: Hello and welcome to my blog! My name is Carl Centola and I am a data analyst living and working in Boston, MA.
entry.content: Hello and welcome to my blog! My name is Carl Centola and I am a data analyst living and working in Boston, MA.
